name: Corrodo-Robo
description:
This game was made for a school assignment. All Graphics and sprites are original. The main inspirations for thisgame were Nitrome's Toxic 1 and 2, which both featured an army of enemy robots in a vast industrial plant filled with green goop. The player character, platforming and art is also based on a nitrome game,  J-J-Jump.  

MUSIC CREDITS 

  • - Menu Music: Bleeping Demo by Kevin MacLeod
  • - Level Music: Mirrorball by Unknown Author
  • - Boss Music: PLUSFORT by Bucket
  • - Ending Music: The Machine Thinks by Kevin Macleod

All sound effects are from online sound effect repositories, and All Music and Sounds are Royalty free. 

*Boss Death Noise is from DOOM(1995), which itself is a royalty free sound effect.
